# Acceptance Criteria Template

Tie every requirement to measurable validation evidence per ISO/IEC/IEEE 29148 clause 10.

| Requirement ID | Metric / parameter | Benchmark or threshold | Evidence owner | Validation method | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| CITY-LAB-C-02 | Incident routing latency | <= 3s across cities | Control Room Lead | Demonstration witnessed by client | Requires failover test |
| | | | | | |

Checklist before publishing:
- Criterion references the requirement ID and stakeholder intent.
- Metric is measurable (time, count, accuracy, etc.).
- Benchmark/threshold is explicit (no "fast", "robust").
- Evidence owner and method align with the validation protocol plan.
